entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 15. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of snow this evening. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 15. Wind chill near minus 25. Forecast issued 6:25 PM CST Wednesday 01 March 2023
